text: Wethersfield is a town in Connecticut. It is in Hartford County. Many records from colonial times spell the name Weathersfield. However, Native Americans called it Pyquag. There were 27,298 people living in Wethersfield in 2020. == References == == Other websites == * Wethersfield homepage Category:Towns in Hartford County, Connecticut Category:1822 establishments in the United States Category:19th-century establishments in Connecticut
title: Wethersfield, Connecticut
